# Fixing Dates

## Theory
- Common issues with date formats
- Importance of consistent date formats

## Code Example
```{webr-r}
# Load necessary libraries
library(lubridate)

# Sample dataset with dates
data <- data.frame(date = c("2024-01-01", "01-02-2024", "March 3, 2024"))

# Fixing date formats
data$date <- mdy(data$date)
```

# Pivot Longer and Pivot Wider

## Theory
- Differences between pivoting longer and wider
- When to use each method

## Code Example
```{webr-r}
# Load necessary libraries
library(tidyr)

# Sample dataset
data <- data.frame(id = 1:3, key1 = c("A", "B", "C"), key2 = c("X", "Y", "Z"))

# Pivot longer
data_long <- pivot_longer(data, cols = key1:key2, names_to = "key", values_to = "value")

# Pivot wider
data_wide <- pivot_wider(data_long, names_from = key, values_from = value)
```
